metadata.title: CVE-2021-3507 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A heap buffer overflow was found in the floppy disk emulator of QEMU up to6.0.0 (including). It could occur in fdctrl_transfer_handler() inhw/block/fdc.c while processing DMA read data transfers from the floppydrive to the guest system. A privileged guest user could use this flaw tocrash the QEMU process on the host resulting in DoS scenario, or potentialinformation leakage from the host memory.

criterions.comment: qemu package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
